title: GGK Mens 5 Inch Running Shorts Lightweight Quick Dry Athletic Shorts for Workout Gym Training with Back Zipper Pockets
features: Ultra-lightweight,quick-dry fabric helps keep you dry and comfy. A breathable lining offers lightweight and comfortable support.
Elastic waist with inner drawcord helps keep shorts in place.
Two side pockets for convenience and back zippered pocket keeps your valuables secure on the run.
Side motion vents for ventilated comfort and freedom to move. 4-way stretch fabrication allows greater mobility & maintains shape.

Material: 95% Polyester / 5% Spandex; Liner: 92% Polyester / 8% Spandex. Suitable for athletic, workout, exercise, training, running, gym, football,badminton, hiking, jogging, boxing, yoga, jogger, cycling or other outdoor activities
description: GGK Men's 5" Running Workout Shorts Quick Dry Lightweight Athletic Shorts with Liner Zipper Pockets

1. Lightweight & Quick Dry - Keeping you cool and comfortable all day long. 2. Mesh Liner - Brief mesh liner is snug without chafing, and mesh liner also wicks away moisture fast, adding better ventilation. 3. Build-in drawcord - Inner drawcord ensures a comfortable fit and keep your shorts from sliding down. 4. Easy Care - Fully machine washable for easy care. 5. Pocket - Two side pockets for convenience and back zippered pocket keeps your valuables secure. 6. Reflective Logo - Reflective logo allows for additional visibility in low light.
